3.10.0.0.message: **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where Kong Gateway was not able to reconfigure the plugin when using DB-less mode.

3.9.1.0.message: **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where the plugin was not able to reconfigure the plugin when using DB-less mode.

3.9.0.0.message:
**ai-semantic-cache**, **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**, **ai-proxy-advanced**: Made the
`embeddings.model.name` config field a free text entry, enabling use of a
self-hosted (or otherwise compatible) model.
**ai-proxy-advanced**, **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where stale plugin config was not updated in dbless and hybrid mode.
**ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where requests with multiple models caused failures.

3.8.1.0.message: **ai-proxy-advanced**, **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Fixed an issue where stale plugin config was not updated in dbless and hybrid mode.

3.8.0.0.message: **ai-semantic-prompt-guard**: Added the `ai-semantic-prompt-guard` plugin that supports semantic similarity-based prompt guarding.
